title: Send Case Files to Co-Counsel
description: A firm is bringing on co-counsel for a large case and needs to share the primary case files with them.

tasks.description: Identify the key case documents that need to be shared (e.g., all pleadings, major discovery responses).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of essential documents.

tasks.description: Compile the selected documents into a single, organized folder.
Share the folder with the co-counsel via a secure file sharing portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The files are securely transferred to the new legal team.
